channel.title: Mopar Setup For Newbie
channel.description: Hi, I am new to all of this, programming, MoparScape, everything. I want to setup a webpage where my friends can go on and play MoparScape. I want my own web page to run MoparScape in the browser. I don't want the user to have to download anything other then Java to play. Could someone PLEASE show me how to set something like this up in an Html page, and how to link the Java file and everything? I have been searching for two days now and I really want to figure this out. I need a copy-paste ready to go in browser client/game and I'm willing to pay if necessary! Thanks in advance! :)

item.title: Mopar Setup For Newbie
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Take a look at the two links above, and also the tutorial section. All the information you need on how to start a server, maintain it, and add features are within these sections. Also, don’t forget to use the search feature if you can’t find anything straight away.

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar Setup For Newbie
item.dc:creator: @MBFRS MBFRS
item.description:
@MBFRS wrote:

Hi, I am new to all of this, programming, MoparScape, everything.
I want to setup a webpage where my friends can go on and play MoparScape.
I want my own web page to run MoparScape in the browser.
I don’t want the user to have to download anything other then Java to play.
Could someone PLEASE show me how to set something like this up in an Html page, and how to link the Java file and everything? I have been searching for two days now and I really want to figure this out.
I need a copy-paste ready to go in browser client/game and I’m willing to pay if necessary!
Thanks in advance!

Read full topic
